  • Product Details

  • The Chuck Taylor All Star is a symbol of originality and self-expression the world over. The pioneers that put the & lsquo squeak& rsquo in Basketball have been an off-the-court favourite of rock stars and rebels for the past 60 years. Dedicated to basketball champ Chuck Taylor
column27: these Chuck Taylor All-Star series from converse
column28: also called Chucks comes in classic designs. Created using canvas and rubber
column29: this range of sneakers from Converse was initially designed to capture the basketball market
column30:
but soon enough turned into a hot casual footwear favourite.

Upper
denim upper for easy maintenance and durability
Upper with All Star patch detailing beside the ankle and graffiti on the other side of the ankle
Graffiti all over the upper
Contrast lacing for maximum style
Carbon rubber toe box for enhanced protection of the upper foot
Long canvas tongue for added comfort and snug Fit
Lace-ups through metal eyelets for snug fit and durability
Eyelets on the lateral side for ventilation

Midsole
Comfort Insole made of contoured latex foam for high energy return and cushioning

Outsole
Vulcanized rubber outsole for flexibility and traction
Diamond-shaped lugs on the forefoot and heel
column31:
with horizontal lugs and grooves on the toe and heel region and slanting grooves along the periphery and midfoot for superior grip on all terrains

Shoe care
Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda
column32:
1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water
